name: arp

procedures: T1016::[Arp] can be used to display ARP configuration information on the host.
T1018::[Arp] can be used to display a host's ARP cache, which may include address resolutions for remote systems.

description: [Arp](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0099) displays and modifies information about a system's Address Resolution Protocol (ARP) cache. (Citation: TechNet Arp)
